name: This is a game, it's Antss
name_original: This is a game, it's Antss
description: To apply to the CNAM-ENJMIN, the school I wanted to join, I had to create a unity project inspired from boids, so here it is, it's a game where you have to make your ant civilisation survive as long as possible. The "boids" part are the ant colony, which follows the player and act as boids. (this is the demo version, you can't do a lot, and there's some bugs, a complete version will be posted later)
